description:
A high school girl with a cheerful personality. Shares a room with http://anidb.net/ch62179 [Tokaku] in the dorm. The target high school girl by the 12 assassins. Her life has been at stake many times since she was young due to family matters. She never cries despite her unfortunate circumstances and is firmly determined to graduate alive knowing that she is the target.
Source: ANN
name: Ichinose Haru
